description: Shoji Aizawa is Toujou`s right-hand man. He wears sunglasses and has a cool attitude, and is a strong fighter. He has been able to evade one of Oga`s attacks and even hit him, although Oga had been taken by surprise. He and Kaoru are caught in the Ishiyama High destruction and later share a hospital room with Kanzaki, Shiroyama and Himekawa.
name: Aizawa Shoji
